homeDescription: Hello! We are Dacona, a Romanian company which distributes, sells and work with different types of network and security devices. Our main brand is called Teltonika | Networks ,a Lithuanian company which sells different types of industrial routers, gateways, switches and modems.
footerDescription: We are Dacona, dedicated to providing the best service to our customers.Our main brand is called Teltonika | Networks ,a Lithuanian company which sells different types of industrial routers, gateways, switches and modems.
